parameters:
Farmer Gala: Welcome! Take a look, it's a wonderful tavern,
isn't it!

Farmer Gala: However, even though it's a tavern, they only
serve water and milk.
Priestess Sophia: It's like a Mucos without a harbor...

Farmer Gala: Thanks to the Bulk Gang, direct harassment from
Pido has decreased, but there are still many problems.

Farmer Gala: Both the minstrels and the tavern owners are
scared of Pido and don't do anything.

Clea: This is also Priestess Sophia's request. What should
we do first?

Farmer Gala: I'm unable to negotiate the route for alcohol
with Pido, but you should be able to do it!
Farmer Gala: I'm sorry, but could you do me a favor?

Clea: I came here for that purpose. I will definitely make
the negotiation a success.

Priestess Sophia: Hehe, please let me treat you to a special
drink--

Sister Eleo: Please take me with you. It was me who pleaded
with Lord Caron for the construction of the tavern.
Sister Eleo: Besides, I have many thoughts about Lord Pido.

Priestess Sophia: Clea-chan, would it be alright for Eleo-
chan to come along too?

Clea: Of course, everyone in the village sees them as the
clients.

Sister Eleo: Thank you very much! Then, let's go to the
mansion in Camps.

Farmer Gara: I apologize for everything... but please, I'm
begging you!

Farmer Gara: Take a look at this! It's like the liquor store
suddenly brought us some sake!
Farmer Gara: Thank you so much for negotiating with Pido!
Sofia the priestess: I've also brought the bard with me.
Farmer Gara: Go ahead and sing your best song right away!
Bard: And that's the end. Does it seem okay?
Mage Relm: As always, no matter when I hear it...
Thief Nora: Ugh, my ears... what is this pain...
Clea: You really are tone-deaf, aren't you?
Priestess Sophia: Oh my, is it a little harsh?

Farmer Gara: Hahaha, no problem! This is a new tavern, it's
fine to have a novice bard!

Farmer Gara: Alright, let's start the grand opening
celebration! We received this much sake, it's my treat
today!

Farmer Gara: Before I forget, I'll give you your reward.
I'll also give you something that Sophia would be happy
about.

Priestess Sophia: Please leave the quality check to me. Is
there anything else I can help with?

Farmer Gara: Please call out to the old lady at the
orphanage. When she gives the signal, everyone in the
village will gather.

Farmer Gara: Finally opening the store... Ugh, it's going to
get busy!

Shopkeeper Gala: From now on, I am the owner of this shop!
Let's start the grand opening celebration!

Shopkeeper Gala: From now on, I am the owner of this shop!
Let's start the grand opening celebration!

Shopkeeper Gala: Thank you all for gathering here despite
being busy!

Shopkeeper Gala: Thanks to everyone, I was able to open this
shop. I'll make it just as cozy as the shop my old man made.

Shopkeeper Gala: Of course, I'm grateful to everyone... but
I especially want to thank Sister Eleo and Sophia.

Shopkeeper Gala: If it weren't for your contributions, I
wouldn't have been able to make a petition to Lady Caron in
the first place.

Shopkeeper Gala: Thank you so much... My old man... He must
be really happy... *sniffle*...

Shopkeeper Gala: I think I'll borrow the name of a great
empire's priest for this shop.

Shopkeeper Gala: Trivose Tavern. Please think of it as
everyone's new home.

Shopkeeper Gala: Alright, it's a grand opening celebration!
Today, it's on me, so drink, eat, and make some noise!

Shopkeeper Gala: Thank you for coming at such a busy time.
I'm surprised that the village hero has come!

Clea: The request was to obtain alcohol... I believe we have
resolved this issue, haven't we?

Shopkeeper Gala: The issue with Pido is not a problem. What
I want is the specialty of the Trivos Tavern!

Shopkeeper Gala: I think if we have interesting wines that
can't be found in the Campos region, they will become
popular.
Cleric Sophia: Hehe, that's a wonderful idea.

Shopkeeper Gala: I thought you would say that! I've
researched various unique varieties...

Shopkeeper Gala: First, I want the alcohol called 'Ogre
Slayer.' It has a very strong and intense flavor, and it
seems to have many dedicated fans.

Shopkeeper Gala: It seems that it can be obtained at the
Fotizona Port auction.
Clea: Understood, I will go and obtain it.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
Priestess Sophia: I've been waiting to kill the ogre.

Shopkeeper Gala: Thank you! Well then, we need a taste test
to see if it's worthy of being a specialty.
Priestess Sophia: Yes, I will accompany you.
Clea: Please keep it moderate, okay?
Shopkeeper Gala: Ugh, ugh... this... this is unbelievable...

Priestess Sophia: E-even I must admit... Ugh, killing ogres
is not just for show...
Thief Nora: Just the smell... I-I'm starting to feel sick...
Mage Relm: How long do we have to hold our noses for!
Mage Relm: Please throw it away quickly!

Shopkeeper Gala: It was a wine that exceeded the rumors...
It's questionable whether we can even call it wine.

Priestess Sophia: At this rate, it will become a specialty
shop in a different sense.

Shopkeeper Gala: If only there was something else
interesting, a wine that could rival our specialty...
Thief Nora: Let's go meet Mr. Kabaji!

Shopkeeper Gala: Kabaji, is that the [Kabaji] you're talking
about!? He's the genius who created the miraculous wine that
gave birth to the right eye of Deirei.

Mage Relm: Actually, we're here on a request! We heard that
the winery has reopened in the Mucos region.

Clea: Indeed, it seems worth going to Mucos and checking it
out.

Shopkeeper Gala: Please, I beg of you! Being able to drink
Kabaji's sake is the best specialty!
Clea: Understood, I'll do my best to help.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Shopkeeper Gala: I'm sorry, but I'm counting on you! It
seems that you can bid on Ogre killers at the auction.

Shopkeeper Gala: If we have the wine of the legendary man in
our store, it will definitely bring us great prosperity!
Clea: I brought Kabaji-san's new work.
Shop Owner Gala: Unbelievable... Show it to me!

Shop Owner Gala: Wow... This wine is amazing... I can see
Kabaji's meticulous work shining through.
Shop Owner Gala: What's the name of this wine?

Sophia the Priestess: I apologize for the audacity... but I
have been given a name.

Shop Owner Gala: That's great! The name of the shop is the
Great Imperial Priest Truvos.

Shop Owner Gala: The famous wine is our great drunkard,
Sophia!
Priestess Sophia: Hehe, I'm honored that you're pleased.

Shop Owner Gala: Is it okay for you to bring wine regularly
even during your journey?
Clea: Understood, leave it to me.
Clea: Sophia-san, is something the matter?

Priestess Sophia: No... It's nothing, it's nothing... Don't
worry about it.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Shopkeeper Gala: I've created the best specialty dish! It's
interesting to have both the shop and the specialty wine
named after a priest!
Bard: Hey, sorry for calling you out of the blue.

Mage Relm: I haven't done anything suspicious! I am
diligently striving to become a proper Archmage!

Mage Relm: Please don't attack me for something I don't
remember doing!

Bard: Hahaha, don't worry, I'm done with your case. Besides,
if you're doing something dangerous, I'll go give you a
warning.
Bard: Please take care of me at that time.
Mage Relm: I really don't want you to come, but...
Clea: Is it okay if this request is about finding a name?

Bard: Didn't I tell you guys before? I've been curious about
it ever since.

Bard: Whenever you feel like it, haha. There's no particular
reward I can give you anyway.
Thief Nora: No way! Names are important things!
Thief Nora: You absolutely need to remember!

Priestess Sophia: I agree as well. It's proof that it was
not the hero, but rather [you] who was there.
Bard: Hmm, you're more serious than I thought.
Clea: May I ask you to first give us some clues?

Mage Relm: You don't remember anything at all!? It's
impossible to investigate when you don't even know your
hometown!

Bard: Ahaha, it's a rough guess, but is it within the
territory of the Empire?

Bard: I've said it many times, but it's not something
important. If you happen to find something during your
journey, just let me know.

Mage Relm: If there's a possibility, it might be the Magic
Academy, I suppose...
Clea: Yes, let's investigate at the academy.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Drunkard: If there's a new bar, I gotta drink there! Not
that I haven't been drinking even before the bar opened,
hahaha!

The woman who came to eat and walk says, The food here is
delicious, isn't it?

Innkeeper: Welcome! Please feel free to use any available
seat!
Innkeeper: Welcome! Please order whatever you like!

I am a wandering minstrel. This place is wonderful, and I
intend to sing about this establishment and spread the word
through my songs.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

One-armed Opro: I'm glad you came. Let's exchange
information right away.

One-armed Opro: The Castle of Great Rocks... It was a blind
spot. Even if I knew about it, it would be doubtful if I
could enter.

Swift Celis: According to the negotiator Proposhi's diary,
there is no doubt that they headed somewhere from the Campos
region.

One-armed Opro: According to the legend, even though it's
called Campos, it is said that they aimed for a new land...

One-armed Opro: If we're going to investigate, it would
probably be near the coast.

Swift Celis: There is no mention of it in the diary, but
there is a possibility that they aimed for somewhere by
land.

Swift Celis: For Pruce, which was annexed more than 50 years
after the establishment of the guild, Valdo may have been a
new land as well.

Thief Nora: I don't understand complicated things... Does
that mean we still don't know anything?

Priestess Sophia: I mentioned this before, but when it comes
to individual investigations that happened over 100 years
ago, it becomes difficult.

Clea: However, since we have taken this request, we need to
find a way to locate their whereabouts.

Mage Relm: Even if there are documents at the Magic Academy,
only advanced sorcerers would be able to access them for
sure...

Mage Relm: When people are gathered! Please sing a little
better!

Bard: Ahaha, didn't I tell you that you're always tone-
deaf?

Bard: Since you all are talking about Pruce, I'll fulfill
your request and sing a song about the adventurer Pruce...

Mage Relm: Sigh, no one ordered anything, right? Shouldn't
we start by going to the Academy and Mr. Goat's place?

Mage Relm: From the perspective of Pruce at that time, they
must have been an undeniable presence, so there should be
some kind of documentation...
Mage Relm: Are both of you listening!?

One-armed Opro: I know the song itself, but there are many
lyrics I've never heard before... 'Ancient Port'...?

One-armed Opro: Hey, youngster! Come over here and tell me
about the lyrics!

Bard: After parting ways with his companions, Pruce wondered
if he could call it a port... In any case, he set sail on
the sea.
Gale Celis: You're talking as if you've seen it before...
Bard: Haha, I was the one who sent him off in the end.

Bard: I thought he was an interesting person, so I thought
he would make a good subject for a song... Is something
wrong?

Gale Celis: What kind of person is this? I can't tell if
they're sane, but I also can't imagine them lying.

Clea: I can't go into details, but... I can assert that the
contents of his story are true.
Gale Celis: There's something I want you to tell me.

Bard: It's the location of the port, right? I'll mark it on
the map, so you should go check it out.

Bard: If you set sail on the sea, no matter what happens,
you must continue straight ahead, right?

Bard: I hope you all return safely because you're
interesting too.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

\CL Area Liberation\c[18]\CL Campus Region / Ancient
Port\c[0]

events.name: QI『イベント名』：テンプレート：吉原

parameters: ※※※該当イベント（シート単位）発生時の処理※※※
左記の出現条件をイベントと揃える
※※※該当イベント（シート単位）終了後は条件に1足して空に※※※
最後には左記の通り、スイッチを条件に空のページを設定

Bard: The heroes have successfully reclaimed the country.
That's the end of it. I wonder if it was somewhat helpful?

Priestess Sophia: Oh my, did that off-key singing make you
feel sick?

Thief Nora: That's rude even if it's the truth! We asked you
to sing for us, didn't we?!

Mage Relm: Nora-san, that's quite rude... Well, if it wasn't
for Clea-san's suggestion, I wouldn't have come.

Bard: You all came to hear the song that was made from the
recapture of the throne, right?
Bard: Did you have a daydream or something?

Clea: I apologize for the interruption, but there is
something I would like to ask again.
Clea: Regarding what we are currently lacking...

Bard: Since it seems like singing would be difficult, if you
have something you want to ask, feel free to talk to me.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Bard: I'll teach you something that I think you're lacking
right now, within my knowledge.
About the weapons you all are using
About the important people we met during our journey
冒険者ギルドの称号について

Bard: I think you know more than me, but within the
Adventurer's Guild, there are 10 titles, right?

Bard: I think that settling the score with the little
adventurer and following the footsteps of the great widow
will be the clue to reaching the final title.

Bard: I think accepting requests at the Adventurer's Guild
is the shortcut to being recognized by the guild.
君たちが使っている武器について

Bard: Have you fully upgraded your weapons? Powerful weapons
are essential for battles, you know.

Bard: Obtaining the final title within the Adventurer's
Guild... Hahaha, and also fulfilling my request.

Bard: If you do that, the stubborn blacksmith of the
Adventurer's Guild should teach you the dream.
旅で出会った重要な人物たちについて

Bard: Just like you all chase after your dreams, the many
people you meet are also chasing after their dreams.

Bard: Not only in each region, but there should also be
people within the guild. If you chase after their dreams
together, you should be able to obtain something important.

Bard: Try to remember the time when you defeated the dragon.
There should have been numerous allies and comrades fighting
alongside you.

Bard: Come anytime, hahaha. I would love to hear your tone-
deaf singing if possible.
Bard: Hey, sorry for calling you out of the blue.

Mage Relm: I haven't done anything suspicious! I am
diligently striving to become a proper Archmage!

Mage Relm: Please don't attack me for something I don't
remember doing!

Bard: Hahaha, don't worry, I'm done with your case. Besides,
if you're doing something dangerous, I'll go give you a
warning.
Bard: Please take care of me at that time.
Mage Relm: I really don't want you to come, but...
Clea: Is it okay if this request is about finding a name?

Bard: Didn't I tell you guys before? I've been curious about
it ever since.

Bard: Whenever you feel like it, haha. There's no particular
reward I can give you anyway.
Thief Nora: No way! Names are important things!
Thief Nora: You absolutely need to remember!

Priestess Sophia: I agree as well. It's proof that it was
not the hero, but rather [you] who was there.
Bard: Hmm, you're more serious than I thought.
Clea: May I ask you to first give us some clues?

Mage Relm: You don't remember anything at all!? It's
impossible to investigate when you don't even know your
hometown!

Bard: Ahaha, it's a rough guess, but is it within the
territory of the Empire?

Bard: I've said it many times, but it's not something
important. If you happen to find something during your
journey, just let me know.

Mage Relm: If there's a possibility, it might be the Magic
Academy, I suppose...
Clea: Yes, let's investigate at the academy.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Bard: Well, I'll teach you something that I think you're
lacking within the extent of my knowledge.

Bard: Hey, is there anything I can help with?

Clea: I wanted to ask about the Chain of the Full Moon
located in the underground of the Atomis Temple.

Bard: The Chain of the Full Moon, huh... It's the one that
the three goddesses argued about what to name it.

Priestess Sophia: The goddesses are really disrespectful,
but they have a rather vulgar feel to them, don't they?

Bard: That's right, they were just arguing about trivial
things all the time.

Clea: It seems that there is something at the end of the
chain. Can you cut the Chain of the Full Moon for me?

Bard: If that's okay with you, then I don't mind. Shall we
go to the Atomis Temple together?

Do you want to skip the adult scene?

Shopkeeper Gala: The wine... Sophia's stock is running
out...

Shopkeeper Gala: I know you're busy, but I'll pay you with
accommodation included, so please go buy it for me!
